#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long 
#define mod 1000000007
ll fun(ll a,int b,ll y)
{
	if(b==0)
	return 1;
	ll temp=fun(a,(b/2),y);
	if(b%2==0)
	return ((temp)%y*(temp)%y)%y;
	else
	return ((a%y)*temp*temp)%y;
	}
	int main()
	{	
		int i,y,n,t;
		ll p;
		scanf("%d",&t);
		while(t--)
		{
		
		scanf("%lld %d",&p,&y);
		n=y-2000;
		for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
		p=fun(p,2,mod);
	
		
		printf("%lld\n",p);
		}
		return 0;
		}
